game.name: EchoLink
game.categories: Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Chat Speech-to-text, Chat Text-to-speech, Color Alternatives, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Subtitle Options
game.shortDescription: EchoLink는 혁신적인 언어 학습 및 실시간 통역 소프트웨어입니다. 단순한 통역 도구를 넘어, 새로운 언어와 문화 콘텐츠를 탐험할 때 든든한 조력자가 되어줍니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: EchoLink is an innovative language learning and real-time translation software. More than just a simple translation tool, it's your essential partner for exploring new languages and cross-cultural content.
